name: Voosh
headline: Making Restaurants more data-driven!
description: Voosh is a Food Technology company aiming to empower Food Service brands using our proprietary visualisation tools and Data Science. One stop visualisation tool for CXOs, Operational heads or Zonal managers to get business insights and take real time decisions to help grow online sales.

founders.name: Priyam Saraswat, Founder
founders.description: I am second time entrepreneur after starting a bike sharing startup named Tazzobikes. Post that launched OYO in China and led new initiatives for a bike sharing startup Bounce.

founders.name: Kshitiz Sanghi, Founder
founders.description: Building Voosh- One-stop solution for restaurants to manage and grow on third party delivery platforms

generated_description:
Voosh is a vibrant food technology startup that launched in 2020, nestled in the bustling tech city of Bengaluru, India. Affirming its mission, Voosh is dedicated to making restaurants more data-driven, empowering food service brands with unique visualization tools and robust data science insights.

Harnessing the power of artificial intelligence, Voosh has built a comprehensive platform aimed at streamlining restaurant operations. This single-stop solution caters to CXOs, operational heads, and zonal managers, allowing them to glean vital business insights and make data-driven, real-time decisions that can significantly boost online sales. 

Part of the esteemed Y Combinator Batch W21, Voosh employs a tight-knit team of 15 talented individuals, guided by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell. Their platform is designed to tackle essential operations through a suite of integrated tools which include:

- **Dispute Manager**: Efficiently recover lost profits from disputes on third-party marketplaces.
- **Promotion Manager**: Track and enhance marketing ROI across various channels.
- **Downtime Controller**: Optimize revenue by minimizing downtime.
- **Reviews & Ratings**: Manage and enhance online reputation seamlessly.
- **Finance & Reconciliation**: Simplify complex payment processes and financial discrepancies.
- **Analytics & Insights**: Unlock the full potential of restaurant data.

Voosh prides itself on customer success, boasting impressive statistics—over $2 million saved for clients, significantly enhanced dispute win rates, and automation of finance management. Their platform connects with major delivery services like DoorDash, UberEats, and Grubhub, making it a versatile ally in the adapting world of food delivery.

For restaurateurs looking to innovate and reclaim lost revenue, Voosh offers a straightforward demo process—no credit card required. As they continue to make waves in the food tech sector, it's clear that Voosh isn’t just a service; it’s a necessary partner for the future of restaurant operations. 

Curious to learn more? Their website (https://voosh.ai/) is packed with resources and testimonials from satisfied customers attesting to the transformative impact Voosh has on their businesses.
